articles.description: Merseyside Police say they're responding to reports of a car colliding with pedestrians on Water Street. It is not yet clear if anyone is injured.
articles.title: Liverpool parade live: Man detained after car driven into crowd

articles.description: An off-duty BBC reporter who was attending the parade called it "hell on Earth".
articles.title: 'It missed us by inches': Witnesses describe car driving into crowds at Liverpool FC parade

articles.description: The referees' body made a "poor management decision" in appointing Thomas Bramall to officiate Aston Villa's defeat by Manchester united, says former referees' boss Keith Hackett.
articles.title: Aston Villa: PGMOL made 'poor decision' to appoint Thomas Bramall for Manchest United match - Keith Hackett

articles.description: Matheus Cunha's transfer to Manchester United is at an advanced stage as the Wolves forward nears a £62.5m move to Old Trafford.
articles.title: Matheus Cunha: Manchester United close to signing Wolves striker

articles.description: World number one Jannik Sinner defies a mid-match wobble to begin his French Open campaign with a straight-set victory over Arthur Rinderknech.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Jannik Sinner progresses but Taylor Fritz out in first round

articles.description: New Brazil coach Carlo Ancelotti says he is "honoured and proud to lead the best team in the world" and targets winning the 2026 World Cup.
articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti: Brazil 'best in the world', says new national team boss

articles.description: England withstand all-rounder Hayley Matthews' brilliance to win the third and final T20 by 17 runs and complete a dominant series clean sweep in Charlotte Edwards and Nat Sciver-Brunt's first series in charge.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Hosts secure T20 series clean sweep despite Hayley Matthews' brilliance

articles.description: Xabi Alonso declares the start of a new era as he is unveiled as the new manager of Real Madrid.
articles.title: Xabi Alonso announces 'start of new era' at Real Madrid

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz says he "expected a worse level" from himself after starting his French Open title defence with victory over Giulio Zeppieri.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Carlos Alcaraz 'expected worse level' at start of title defence

articles.description: Warren Gatland takes up a short-term advisory role with Uruguayan side Penarol, three months after leaving his role with Wales.
articles.title: Warren Gatland: Ex-Wales coach takes up advisory role with Uruguayan club Penarol
